"Revelations," Part 5 (of 6),2007,12
All hype aside, this issue, the penultimate chapter of Revelations, is the most significant Ghost Rider issue since August of '72. No B.S. Get it quickly and avoid the Internet until after you've read it.
Parental Advisory ...$2.99
